channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA

item.title: 🔴 13:46 Air alarm to the Zhytomyr Oblast follow the following messages.
item.description: 🔴 13:46 Air alarm to the Zhytomyr Oblast follow the following messages.#Zhytomyr_. This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.
